divs: Sighting DetailsAround 2 pm today, I went to the www.trafficland.com website in VA, specifically the one traffic cam at the US29 and I-64 interchange in Charlottesville (my boyhood hometown region). The object in the right-center is VERY interesting. It may be that this is part of a street light, with the pole obscured by whatever. I have not enlarged the picture to examine it more closely as I wanted to send the raw picture for you to see. It reminds me of the spacecraft in the movie, "Independence Day."
Summary: Observed as still traffic cam picture.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Charlottesville
There were no other sightings in Charlottesville on or around May 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
